verses.verse: <S%G2455>Jude,<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G2385>James,<s%> to those who are <S%G2822>called,<s%> <S%G37>sanctified<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5083>kept<s%> for <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>
<S%G1656>Mercy<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> be <S%G4129>multiplied.<s%>

<S%G27>Beloved,<s%> while I <S%G3956>was<s%> <S%G3956>very<s%> <S%G4160>eager<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> our <S%G2839>common<s%> <S%G4991>salvation,<s%> <S%G2192>I<s%> <S%G2192>was<s%> <S%G318>constrained<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3870>exhorting<s%> you to <S%G1864>contend<s%> earnestly for the <S%G4102>faith<s%> which <S%G3860>was<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> for all <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to the <S%G40>saints.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> there <S%G3921>are<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> who crept in <S%G3921>secretly,<s%> even those who <S%G4270>were<s%> <S%G3819>long<s%> ago <S%G4270>written<s%> about <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2917>condemnation:<s%> ungodly <S%G765>men,<s%> <S%G3346>turning<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2316>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G766>indecency,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G720>denying<s%> <S%G2316>our<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G1203>Master,<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2257><s%> <S%G1203>Lord,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G1014>desire<s%> <S%G5279>to<s%> <S%G5279>remind<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G1492>though<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G530>already<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> having <S%G4982>saved<s%> a <S%G2992>people<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> <S%G1208>afterward<s%> <S%G622>destroyed<s%> those who <S%G3361>didn't<s%> <S%G4100>believe.<s%>

<S%G32>Angels<s%> who <S%G3361>didn't<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G1438>their<s%> first <S%G746>domain,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G620>deserted<s%> their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3613>dwelling<s%> <S%G5083>place,<s%> he has kept <S%G1199>in<s%> <S%G126>everlasting<s%> <S%G1199>bonds<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G2217>darkness<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G2920>judgment<s%> of <S%G2250>the<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

Even <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1116>Gomorrah,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> <S%G4012>around<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5158>having,<s%> in the <S%G3664>same<s%> <S%G5125><s%> <S%G5158>way<s%> as <S%G1608>these,<s%> given themselves over to sexual immorality <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G565>gone<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G2087>strange<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> are set <S%G4295>forth<s%> as an <S%G1164>example,<s%> <S%G5254>suffering<s%> the <S%G4442>punishment<s%> <S%G4442>of<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G4442>fire.<s%>

Yet in the <S%G3668>same<s%> <S%G3778>way,<s%> these <S%G2532>also<s%> in their <S%G1797>dreaming<s%> <S%G3392>defile<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G114>despise<s%> <S%G2963>authority,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G987>slander<s%> celestial <S%G1161>beings.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3413>Michael,<s%> the <S%G743>archangel,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G1252>contending<s%> with the <S%G1228>devil<s%> and <S%G1256>arguing<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G5111>dared<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> bring against <S%G2018>him<s%> <S%G2920>an<s%> <S%G988>abusive<s%> <S%G2920>condemnation,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> "May the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> <S%G4671>you!<s%>"

<S%G3303>But<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> speak <S%G987>evil<s%> of <S%G3745>whatever<s%> things they <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1492>know.<s%> <S%G3745>What<s%> they <S%G1987>understand<s%> <S%G5447>naturally,<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G2226>creatures<s%> without <S%G249>reason,<s%> they are <S%G1161>destroyed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> these <S%G5125>things.<s%>

<S%G3759>Woe<s%> to <S%G846>them!<s%> <S%G3754>For<s%> they <S%G4198>went<s%> in the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2535>Cain,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ran <S%G1632>riotously<s%> in the <S%G4106>error<s%> of <S%G903>Balaam<s%> for <S%G3408>hire,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G622>perished<s%> in <S%G2879>Korah<s%>'s <S%G485>rebellion.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> hidden rocky <S%G4694>reefs<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> feasts when they feast <S%G4910>with<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> shepherds who without <S%G870>fear<s%> <S%G4165>feed<s%> <S%G1438>themselves;<s%> <S%G3507>clouds<s%> without <S%G504>water,<s%> carried <S%G4064>along<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G417>winds;<s%> <S%G5352>autumn<s%> <S%G1186>leaves<s%> without <S%G175>fruit,<s%> <S%G1364>twice<s%> <S%G599>dead,<s%> plucked up by the <S%G1610>roots;<s%>

<S%G66>wild<s%> <S%G2949>waves<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> foaming <S%G1890>out<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G152>shame;<s%> <S%G4107>wandering<s%> <S%G792>stars,<s%> for <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2217>blackness<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness<s%> has been <S%G5083>reserved<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>forever.<s%>

<S%G1161>About<s%> <S%G5125>these<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1802>Enoch,<s%> the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G76>Adam,<s%> <S%G4395>prophesied,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> ten <S%G3461>thousands<s%> <S%G40>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> holy <S%G40>ones,<s%>

to <S%G4160>execute<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> <S%G2596>on<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1827>convict<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G765>ungodly<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they have <S%G764>done<s%> in an ungodly <S%G2532>way,<s%> and <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4642>hard<s%> things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G765>ungodly<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>"

<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1113>murmurers<s%> and <S%G3202>complainers,<s%> <S%G4198>walking<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> their <S%G1939>lusts<s%> <S%G2532>(and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2980>speaks<s%> <S%G5246>proud<s%> <S%G2296>things<s%>), showing <S%G2296>respect<s%> <S%G5484>of<s%> <S%G4383>persons<s%> to <S%G5484>gain<s%> <S%G5622>advantage.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5210>you,<s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G3415>remember<s%> the <S%G4487>words<s%> which have been spoken <S%G4280>before<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

They <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1722>"In<s%> <S%G5550>the<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> there will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1703>mockers,<s%> <S%G4198>walking<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G763>ungodly<s%> <S%G3754>lusts.<s%>"
<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> they <S%G1438>who<s%> cause <S%G592>divisions,<s%> and are <S%G5591>sensual,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5210>you,<s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> keep building <S%G2026>up<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> <S%G4102>on<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> most <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

<S%G5083>Keep<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> looking <S%G4327>for<s%> the <S%G1656>mercy<s%> <S%G2962>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>
<S%G2532>On<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> have <S%G1653>compassion,<s%> making a <S%G3303>distinction,<s%>

<S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G4982>save,<s%> <S%G726>snatching<s%> them out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5401>fear,<s%> <S%G3404>hating<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G5509>clothing<s%> <S%G4695>stained<s%> <S%G575>by<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> to him who is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G5442>keep<s%> <S%G5209>them<s%> from <S%G679>stumbling,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2476>present<s%> you <S%G299>faultless<s%> before the <S%G2714>presence<s%> <S%G1391>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> great <S%G20>joy,<s%>

<S%G2316>to<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Savior,<s%> who <S%G3441>alone<s%> is <S%G4680>wise,<s%> be <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3172>majesty,<s%> <S%G2904>dominion<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1849>power,<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>forever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
